title: Ticket #985: cream_gahp has potential buffer overflow in gahp_printf
description: #939 revealed that the cream_gahp has a potential buffer overflow in gahp_printf. To the best of our current knowledge, it's not possible to trigger in any released version (thus, no version history entry), however new, unreleased development has stumbled over it and it needs to be fixed.
check_ins: 2009-Nov-19 15:21   Check-in [16388]: (#985) - Fix potential buffer overflow. To the best of our knowledge, no released version could actually trigger this, thus, no version history entry. Ongoing development work walked into it. (By Alan De Smet )
creator: adesmet
